div.div: at St. Paul, Minn. | Reynolds Field

tr.td: Northwestern has won the toss and elects to defer.
Augsburg will receive the ball to start the game.
Change of possession, UNW ball on UNW35, 1st and 10.
Ben Lyons kickoff 52 yards to the AUG13, Isiah Malone return 13 yards to the AUG26 (Gideon Burnham; Asa Marangoni).
R.Guyton rush for no gain to the AUG26 (Nick Swore).
R.Guyton pass incomplete to Tino Satar (Austin Stubbs).
R.Guyton sacked for loss of 5 yards to the AUG21 (Nick Swore; T. Van Maanen).
Glenn Meyers punt 28 yards to the AUG49, out-of-bounds.
BJ Foster rush for 6 yards to the AUG43 (Barclay Bates).
BJ Foster rush for 1 yard to the AUG42 (Derek Glynn).
